headerDisplay: This plugin works with webOS based TV and are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired.

getFromDevice.title: Load Inputs From Device
getFromDevice.description: This function get all available inputs direct from device, manually configured inputs will be skipped.

filterSystemApps.title: Hide System Apps
filterSystemApps.description: If enabled, all System Apps will not be displayed on the list of inputs.

displayOrder.title: Display Order
displayOrder.description: Here select display order of the inputs list.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Here set the Input/App, Channel reference.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

command.title: RC Command
command.description: Here select the remote control command.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for button name.

power.title: Power
power.description: This expose Power as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Power ON.

pixelRefresh.title: Pixel Refresh
pixelRefresh.description: This expose Pixel Refresh as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if PixelRefresh ON.

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: This expose Volume as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Volume change.

mute.title: Mute
mute.description: This expose Mute as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Mute ON.

soundMode.title: Sound Mode
soundMode.description: This expose Sound Mode as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Sound Mode change, webOS >= 6.0.

soundOutput.title: Sound Output
soundOutput.description: This expose Sound Output as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Sound Output change.

pictureMode.title: Picture Mode
pictureMode.description: This expose Picture Mode as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Picture Mode change, webOS >= 4.0.

screenOnOff.title: Screen Off
screenOnOff.description: This expose Screen ON/OFF as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Screen Off, webOS >= 4.0.

screenSaver.title: Screen Saver
screenSaver.description: This expose Screen Saver as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Screen Saver ON, webOS >= 4.0.

playState.title: Play State
playState.description: This expose Play State as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Playing, webOS >= 7.0.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: This expose Channel as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Input change.

input.title: Input
input.description: This expose Input as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Input change.

items.title: Inputs
items.description: Here create Input/App Sensors based on reference, sensor will active if switch to it.

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select sensor type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sensor name.

broadcastAddress.title: Broadcast address
broadcastAddress.description: Her set network broadcast address, only if You use VLANS in Your network configuration and Your router/switch support IP Directed Broadcast.

startInput.title: Default Input
startInput.description: This enable possibilty to set default Input/App after Power ON TV.

startInputReference.title: Input Reference
startInputReference.description: Here set the default Input/App reference.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select what a extra volume/mute control type You want to use.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own volume control name or leave empty.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for volume control name.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own Sound Mode name.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sound mode.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own Sound Output name.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sound output.

brightnessControl.title: Brightness
brightnessControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Brightness.

backlightControl.title: Backlight
backlightControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Backlight.

contrastControl.title: Contrast
contrastControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Contrast.

colorControl.title: Color
colorControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Color.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own Picture Mode name.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for picture mode.

turnOnOff.title: Turn Screen ON/OFF
turnOnOff.description: This enable possibility turn screen ON/OFF, webOS >= 4.0.

saverOnOff.title: Turn Screen Saver ON/OFF
saverOnOff.description: This enable possibility turn screen saver ON/OFF, webOS >= 4.0.

sslWebSocket.title: SSL WebSocket
sslWebSocket.description: This enable SSL WebSocket, support TV with new firmware.

disableTvService.title: Disable TV Service
disableTvService.description: This disable TV service and prevent display double services if TV already support HomeKit native.

infoButtonCommand.title: Info Button
infoButtonCommand.description: Here select the function of info button in RC.

deviceInfo.title: Device Info
deviceInfo.description: This enable logging device info by every connections device to the network.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the listening Port for RESTful server.

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Here optional set the Client ID of MQTT Broker.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

user.title: User
user.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

passwd.title: Password
passwd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.
